com.amertkara.minesweeper

Class SimpleMineSweeper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amertkara.minesweeper.SimpleMineSweeper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MineSweeper

    public class SimpleMineSweeper
extends java.lang.Object
implements MineSweeper
    Implements the basic functionalities of a MineSweeper interface.
    Version:
    0.0.1 27 February 2015
    Author:
    A. Mert Kara

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleMineSweeper

        public SimpleMineSweeper()
        Default Constructor Initializes mineChar, emptyChar and linebreakChar to defaults.

      • SimpleMineSweeper

        public SimpleMineSweeper(char mineChar,
                 char emptyChar,
                 char linebreakChar)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parameterized Constructor Initializes minerChar, emtpyChar and linebreakChar to custom chars. These variables should be unique otherwise it would affect the matrix structure.
        Parameters:
        mineChar -
        emptyChar -
        linebreakChar -
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the variables are not different.

      • setMineField

        public void setMineField(java.lang.String mineField)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Implements the abstract setMineField method. The mine field string is checked for illegal characters and also the size of the rows are compared to form a proper matrix.
        Specified by:
        setMineField in interface MineSweeper
        Parameters:
        mineField - contains the mine field.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the mineField variable contains illegal characters or the size of the rows are not equal.
        See Also:
        MineSweeper.setMineField(String)

      • getHintField

        public java.lang.String getHintField()
                              throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Implements the abstract getHintField method. The mine field string is checked for illegal characters and also the size of the rows are compared to form a proper matrix.
        Specified by:
        getHintField in interface MineSweeper
        Returns:
        a string representation of the hint-field
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the mineField is not initialized.
        See Also:
        MineSweeper.getHintField()
